org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer

Interface SafeTextSerializer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CatalogType, TextSerializer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FormattingCodeTextSerializer

    public interface SafeTextSerializer
extends TextSerializer
    Represents a TextSerializer that accepts input in any format and will therefore never throw an exception when parsing a serialized Text.
    See Also:
    TextSerializer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Text deserialize(String input)
      Returns a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
      default Text deserializeUnchecked(String input)
      Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer.TextSerializer

        serialize, serializeSingle

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.CatalogType

        getId, getName

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        Text deserialize(String input)
        Description copied from interface: TextSerializer
        Returns a Text instance from an appropriately formatted string.
        Specified by:
        deserialize in interface TextSerializer
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to parse into a text
        Returns:
        The parsed text for the input string

      • deserializeUnchecked

        default Text deserializeUnchecked(String input)
        Description copied from interface: TextSerializer
        Tries to return a Text instance from the provided input string. However, if the input string is not of a valid format, the returned Text object will be of the raw input, rather than throwing an exception.
        Specified by:
        deserializeUnchecked in interface TextSerializer
        Parameters:
        input - The raw input to try to parse into a text
        Returns:
        The parsed text for the input string, or the raw input
